column4: , You take your os with you on a thubmstrick ?  How has that been working out for you ?
- yup. it's perfect, so long as you can boot and have USB 2.0, (my laptop's only got usb1.1 and .. well don't even bother going there.. )
, for using a usb  thumbstrick as an install mediem
, you Saying put the live cd iso on an usb thumbstrick and trick it into think the usb thumb strick is a live cd and use it for the installer
